rows.label: tev910401_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev910401_SEL0020
rows.name: Ask about his BLADE assignment.

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0030
rows.name:
Ah, well, I'm a Curator, in Captain Eric's
team. We're in charge of surveying Mira's
biology![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0040
rows.name:
I've always had an affinity for animals,
and nature and stuff, so I'd like to think
I'm pretty well-suited to the job![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_JNK0050
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev910401_SEL0060
rows.name: Ask how he's been doing lately.

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0070
rows.name:
I know Mira's gonna be our home now,
and I know it doesn't sit well with a lotta
folk, but it's all a matter of perspective.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0080
rows.name:
Think about all the new species of flora
and fauna! All the things you'd never see
on Earth... Doesn't that excite you?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0090
rows.name:
Well, for me it does. Honestly, I'm grateful
I get to explore more of this incredible
world with every new day.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_JNK0100
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev910401_SEL0110
rows.name: Ask what happened with his jail sentence.

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0120
rows.name:
Actually, Captain Eric and my other
coworkers spoke to Commander Vandham
on my behalf.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0130
rows.name:
Seems he agreed keeping me locked up
would be a waste of resources, so I'm
working off my debt to society instead.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0140
rows.name: Man... I seriously owe Captain Eric.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_JNK0150
rows.name: Discuss

rows.label: tev910401_SEL0160
rows.name: Ask about the genetic data you gathered.

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0170
rows.name: ...It hurts even more now.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0180
rows.name:
There's no saving everything.
You do what you can, and that's that.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0190
rows.name:
The people in charge of Project Exodus
must've been thinking the same thing...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0200
rows.name:
I'll take charge of gathering the
genetic data from Noctilum. Please,
you handle the other continents![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0210
rows.name:
We have to bring proof of Mira's existence
with us. If we don't do it, who will...?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0220
rows.name: Cancel

rows.label: tev910401_MSG0230
rows.name: Cancel
